name: San Francisco Free Clinic
description: The San Francisco Free Clinic provides free, accessible medical treatment to the uninsured while advancing the field of primary care by providing educational opportunities for future medical practitioners. The clinic is open (by appointment only) so that medical care can still be provided to those who do not have access elsewhere. All clinic staff and volunteers are fully vaccinated against COVID-19. This includes our regular clinic, diabetes clinic, psychiatry, social work/counseling, nutrition

address: 4900 California Street (at 11th Avenue), San Francisco, CA, 94118
